summary: Provides a Bridgecrew platform integration layer that authenticates, retrieves configuration, filters policies, and persists various Checkov scan artifacts (results, metadata, graphs, assets) to the Bridgecrew/Prisma APIs and S3 storage, with caching and retry mechanisms.
business_intent: Allows Checkov to automatically transmit security scan findings and related data to the Bridgecrew (or Prisma) cloud platform for centralized analysis, compliance reporting, and policy enforcement.
